db:info.db:title: WriteItem QML Type
db:info.db:titleabbrev: An OPC UA module for Qt

db:abstract.db:para: Specifies an item to be written to the server.
This type was introduced in QtOpcUa 5.13.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type is used to specify items to be written to the server using the function Connection::writeNodeAttributes.

db:section.db:title: attribute : Constants.NodeAttribute
db:section.db:para: Determines the attribute of the node to be written.

db:section.db:title: indexRange : string
db:section.db:para: Determines the index range of the attribute to be written. If not needed, leave this property empty.

db:section.db:title: ns : variant
db:section.db:para: Determines the namespace of the node to be written. The namespace can be given by name or index. If this property is given, any namespace in the node id will be ignored.

db:section.db:title: serverTimestamp : datetime
db:section.db:para: Sets the server timestamp for the value to be written. If the server timestamp is invalid, it is ignored by the client and not sent to the server. If the server doesn't support writing timestamps, the write operation for this item will fail.

db:section.db:title: sourceTimestamp : datetime
db:section.db:para: Sets the source timestamp for the value to write. If the source timestamp is invalid, it is ignored by the client and not sent to the server. If the server doesn't support writing timestamps, the write operation for this item will fail.

db:section.db:title: statusCode : OpcUaStatus
db:section.db:para: Sets the status code for the value to write. If no status code is set, no status code is sent to the server.

db:section.db:title: value : variant
db:section.db:para: Actual data that is requested to be written.

db:section.db:title: valueType : variant
db:section.db:para: If given, the type information will be used in converting the value to a SDK specific data type.
